name: Castle Day
description:
Travel the world of Castle Day and defeat monsters to get them as Pets. From the Level Select Screen, click on the Pet shop to select your Companion or press Escape at any time to quit the level you are playing and select a Companion.

Controls:

  • Move with Arrow Keys
  • Attack with Spacebar
  • Press Escape to access the Pet Shop

Your Pet will follow you and attack automatically. If your Pet is defeated, you can revive it with 1 HP by touching it.
